item.title: I Got Out!
item.description: On 16 December 2022, I attended Georgia Tech’s Commencement ceremony at Bobby Dodd Stadium and walked across the stage to receive my Master of Science in Computer Science diploma. My Master of Science in Computer Science diploma (Since Georgia Tech doesn’t show your specialization except in your transcript, and doesn’t confer academic honors to Master students, can I quickly state for the record that I specialized in Machine Learning and had a 4.

item.title: Hello Maths
item.description: This is an inline equation. $\exists x \forall y$ s.t. $x=y$ A block equation is shown below: $$ \exists x \forall \textit{ s.t. } x=y $$
